sentences.en: a deep male voice
sentences.cn: 低沉的男声

sentences.en: adult male bears
sentences.cn: 成年公熊

sentences.en: Although things are changing the medical establishment is still overwhelmingly male.
sentences.cn: 虽然世易时移，但医学界依然是男性的天下。

sentences.en: Courtship is somewhat vocal with a lot of displaying by the male.
sentences.cn: 雄性动物在求偶时会尽量展示自己，并发出一些声响。

sentences.en: Her independence of spirit marked her out from her male fellow officers.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神使她有别于共事的男性军官。

sentences.en: How many judges in our male-dominated courts are sensitized to women's issues?
sentences.cn: 在男性占主导地位的法庭上，有多少法官对妇女问题是比较敏感的呢？

sentences.en: I realize there's no consensus on what are male or female values.
sentences.cn: 我意识到人们对什么是男性价值观和什么是女性价值观并无共识。

sentences.en: In male company, perhaps he did overstep the bounds of propriety.
sentences.cn: 在清一色男性的公司里，可能他的举止确实有失得体。

sentences.en: In Norse mythology the moon is personified as male.
sentences.cn: 在斯堪的纳维亚神话里，月亮被赋予了男性身份。

sentences.en: It is often very hard to compare all-male and all-female jobs.
sentences.cn: 纯男性工作和纯女性工作之间常常很难作比较。

sentences.en: Males and females take turns brooding the eggs.
sentences.cn: 雌雄轮流孵卵。

sentences.en: Many women earn less than their male colleagues.
sentences.cn: 许多女性挣钱比她们的男性同事少。

sentences.en: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.cn: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

sentences.en: Police described her attacker as a white male aged about 25.
sentences.cn: 警方称袭击她的人是一名大约25岁的白人男子。

sentences.en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentences.en: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females.
sentences.cn: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: The male sex comes out of the film very badly.
sentences.cn: 这部影片中男性的形象非常负面。

sentences.en: This title will only pass down through the male line.
sentences.cn: 这个头衔将只能传给男性后裔。

sentences.en: traditional male values
sentences.cn: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentences.en: Why is full-frontal male nudity still so scarce in films?
sentences.cn: 为什么男性正面全裸的镜头在电影里还是如此少见呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 大男人主义者；歧视女性的人
n. [化]雄性激素；男性荷尔蒙
雄性不育；男性不育；雄性不育性；男性不育症

trans.tran_cn: 男性的，雄性的，有力的，[植]雄性的，仅有雄蕊的
trans.tran_en: typical of or relating to men or boys

trans.tran_cn: 男，雄性动物，[植]雄性植物，马累[马律]
